body.name: Rubbermaid Commercial Executive Series Lobby Pro Dustpan with Long Handle, Black (FG253104BLA), 5" x 12-3/4" x 11-1/4"
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 5 hrs 29 mins
features: Sturdy plastic won't stain, discolor, or absorb odors
body.description: The Rubbermaid Commercial Upright Dust Pan features a stylish long handle dust pan design for easy clean-up. The upright dust pan is self-opening and closing and includes an adjustable handle grip. The Rubbermaid dust pan is designed with rear wheels for reduced wear and is constructed of sturdy plastic that won't stain, discolor, or absorb odors. These dust pans are ideal for use in malls, restaurants, lobbies and other locations with heavy traffic.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Rubbermaid Commercial Products Rubbermaid Commercial Products, headquartered in Winchester, Va., is a manufacturer of innovative, solution-based products for commercial and institutional markets worldwide. Since 1968, RCP has pioneered technologies and system solutions in the categories of food services, sanitary maintenance, waste handling, material transport, away-from-home washroom, and safety products. RCP, an ISO 9001:2000 manufacturer, is part of Newell Brands global portfolio and continues to develop innovative products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this single piece model
reviews.reviewText: I read another review saying that this model of this dust pan is a single piece item meaning that it cannot be disassembled. There's a similar Amazon listing, but that model comes in two pieces that you assemble yourself and that dustpan is considered flimsy because of it. I can confirm that this model does arrive in a large box and it's one piece. I prefer this as a single piece because it feels more sturdy knowing that it can't come apart and it's exactly like the one I was trying to replace. I had my previous Rubbermaid commercial dustpan for 10+ years of heavy use. If you want a sturdy dust pan, I suggest buying this one piece model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and very useful.
reviews.reviewText: Seems durable. Feels like it should last forever. The handle is long enough, and I like that there's a recess at the back of the scoop part, to allow your fingers to more easily upend the scoop into the trash. With all the other dust pans I've used, they didn't have this feature and I'm glad it's there.It has a tendency to unscrew itself. All dust pans I've ever used have done this, so I don't really consider it a problem. You would think they would come up with some sort of way to positively fasten the pan and handle together, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A really terrific product!!!!
reviews.reviewText: This dustpan saves the person who is sweeping from having to bend over to pick up a dust pan from the floor. I can sweep and empty the dustpan into the trashcan without ever bending over. This is especially important to me because I have a bad back. I cannot say this dustpan makes me enjoy sweeping but I sure do not dread it like I did before I got this dustpan. A wonderful product and so easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for Home Use. Hugs the Floor, Easy to Sweep Into. Lightweight.
reviews.reviewText: For home use, this product is brilliant. Works well on wood floors in the home and sealed concrete in the garage.Lightweight, easy to carry around. The edge lip lays flat and makes it easy to sweep even small particles and dust inside. Handle could be longer, but it's adequate. Only real issue is with emptying it, it tends to flop around a bit. Emptying into larger bin or dumpster is not a problem, but smaller bins may be frustrating unless you hold it with both hands while emptying.I'm not sure why this is in the Rubbermaid Commercial line of products, this is not built like a commercial product. For commercial use you are probably better off looking elsewhere for something beefier and more durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The FG253104BLA is the one to get.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered both the FG253100BLA (on the left in photos) and FG253104BLA to see if there was any difference. The 104BLA came pre-assembled; the 100BLA was shipped as three parts in a plastic bag. After following the illustration for assembly, I used each one for a while and found the following: The hinge on the 100BLA was stiff, not allowing the bin to drop all the way vertical when lifted, as the 104BLA did. The lip on the 100BLA had a slight curve into the bin, producing a gap with the floor when lowered, allowing dirt to be swept under the bin. The 104BLA's lip was curved slightly away from the bin. When lowered, the edge straightened out flat against the floor with the weight of the bin and handle on it. The 100BLA also had more mold flashing on the bin (seen in the close-up photo). The parts of each unit seem to be made with the same machines, but the difference is in quality control. They apparently pick the best parts off the line, assemble them, and check for smoothness of operation for the 104BLA. The rest of the parts get bagged and sold as the FG253100BLA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I read a review of another Rubbermaid Libby pan I had ordered. I read his review and it made me change the one I bought.This has a flat lip and it swings easily to dump it. I am glad I listened. I am using it in my work shop at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for seniors!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this dustpan. I no longer have to stoop down to wrestle with a hand held dustpan. I simply set it down and sweep into it, lift it up (it self lifts to a non-spill position) and dump it in my trash. I find that it leaves less dirt on the floor when I sweep into it so I don't have to resweep and resweep bits that are left on the floor.My grandson remarked that it was the same dustpan they use at his work. 5 stars for this item!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sooooo nice not to have to bend down to the floor to sweep up!
reviews.reviewText: A vey nice, sturdy, quality product. And OH SO NICE not to have to bend down to the floor with my bad hip. And the other reviewers are correct, the edge of this dustpan is curved in the correct direction so that when you put it on the floor very little goes under the edge. Most of what you are sweeping up goes right into the bucket and you don't have to bend over to do this.Fantastic!
